subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The Wildcats edged Providence, 63-61, to reach the conference tournament final for the first time since 1997. They will face Xavier, which held off Georgetown, 65-63.
snippet: The Wildcats edged Providence, 63-61, to reach the conference tournament final for the first time since 1997. They will face Xavier, which held off Georgetown, 65-63.
